did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript and printed articles, speeches and pamphlets concerning medical research, the University of Arizona, the Tucson school system, and biographical sketches of himself, University presidents, and pioneer physicians.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Speeches, Articles and Pamphlets (AZ 258). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Physician, Arizona; University of Arizona Board of Regents, 1897-1899, 1914-1918.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript and printed articles, speeches and pamphlets concerning medical research, the University of Arizona, the Tucson school system, and biographical sketches of himself, University presidents, and pioneer physicians. Sketches of prominent pioneer physicians include John C. Handy, George Emery Goodfellow, Leonard Wood, Adolphus H. Moon, and Hiram Fenner.
